Package iot.mqtt

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MqttClientBasicApi
    Interface with basic API for a mqtt client
    MqttMessageType
    interface to identify the mqtt message type
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicMqttMessage
    MqttMessage that represent a message from an Application to the NetworkServer
    LoraWanPacketWrapper
    Wrapper of a LoraWanPacket as mqtt message.
    MqttBrokerMock
    Mock that represent a mqtt broker
    MQTTClientFactory
    Factory to retrieve an instance of MqttClientBasicApi
    MqttMock
    Mock implementation of a mqtt client
    PahoMqttClient
    Mqtt client for a real mqtt server.
    Topics
    Class of utils to manage all the mqtt topics
    TransmissionWrapper
    Wrapper of a LoraTransmission as mqtt message.
